org.gearvrf

Class GVRShadowMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gearvrf.GVRHybridObject
      • org.gearvrf.GVRComponent
        • org.gearvrf.GVRBehavior
          • org.gearvrf.GVRRenderTarget
            • org.gearvrf.GVRShadowMap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GVRDrawFrameListener

    public class GVRShadowMap
extends GVRRenderTarget
    Causes a shadow map to be rendered from the viewpoint of the scene object which owns the shadow map. A shadow map is only rendered if a light is attached to the owning scene object. All of the shadow maps are kept in a single texture array and they must all be the same size. This array is created the first time a GVRShadowMap component is created.
    See Also:
    GVRRenderTarget, GVRRenderTextureArray
